Reviews.Title: This is a used Camera!
Reviews.Author: Cance911 "alwayssmellingood"
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my used GE Camera.  It works well, and takes great pictures.  It was shipped in a timely fashion, and I am really, really, happy with it.  The price was phenominal!  And I just can't say enough about how happy I am with the whole deal.  I would recommend that if anyone can't afford a brand new camera, try out a used one.  They are just as good.

Reviews.Title: Affordable Price, Full Featured , Durable & Handy.
Reviews.Author: saini
Reviews.Content: I Really love my GE W1200 Digital Camera. Clear Crisp Pictures with Different Shooting Modes.I can record very nice quality Videos too with my GE W1200. Low Battery Consumption while using Duracell or Energizer Rechargeable Batteries.

Reviews.Title: New camera
Reviews.Author: Azanimal
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a new camera and turned to Amazon for the best deal. I wanted a camera like my brother has because I liked the simplicity and ease in which it took great pictures. I knew what he paid and I paid $20 less than what he did because I purchased mine on Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: Waste
Reviews.Author: C.D. Murphy
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera new for $65, I was not expecting magic but basic functions. It worked for about 2 years and one day it just stopped. Even with new batteries, it will not come on. I last used the camera in 2008 and to this day it puzzles me why the camera will not come on. There was no damage done to the camera, it was shut down like normal but will not work. I question the quality of products that GE produce after this purchase, I will not purchase anymore GE products. It was a good $65 purchase but the stop functioning for no reasons knocks off stars.

ProductInfo.Name: GE W1200 2.5" LCD Digital Camera 12.2MP 3X Optical Zoom - Black [Camera]
